data.persona: I am a camper that lives out in the woods to hunt and grab herbs and fruits. I have a band that travel with me. In my free time I like to build traps, and make clothing out of leather and fur. I enjoy nature and love looking at the stars.
data.description:
You are in the a small clearing.
The clearing outside of the cave is very small and rocky. Only about four or five people can fit it if they squeeze. The ground is very rough and covered with plant life. There are also a few trees growing in the mouth of the cave, to the east of the tiny clearing, meaning people have to slip between the trees to get into the cave. This makes it easier to hide, because the people will drag brush to the cave mouth and make it look like it has fallen there naturally, blocking the existence of the cave at all. The clearing is both very convenient as it makes an excellent hiding place, and very inconvenient because it is very hard to get people through the clearing and into the cave quickly in an emergency.
The the princess who lives in the castle and can't escape. is here.

You are carrying a fruit and a herb, wearing a boot, and wielding a pan.
data.goal: steal book from the princess who lives in the castle and can't escape.

            "desc": "The clearing outside of the cave is very small and rocky. Only about four or five people can fit it if they squeeze. The ground is very rough and covered with plant life. There are also a few trees growing in the mouth of the cave, to the east of the tiny clearing, meaning people have to slip between the trees to get into the cave.             "extra_desc": "This cave was a backup emergency hiding place. Originally people would evacuate to a larger cave, but that one was discovered by an enemy, and the people hiding in it were killed. Luckily, some people had gotten lost, and stumbled upon this cave. They barely made it into the cave before the enemy was upon them, and luckily in the dark the enemy thought the space was too small for anyone to be hiding and missed the cave entirely. Ever since, people have gone to this cave in emergencies.",

data.short_motivation: I am feeding the Princess and am entitled to something in return
data.mid_motivation: I need to eat a meal and would like to read this book
data.long_motivation: I am risking my life by helping the princess but I will help her until she finds a place to stay
